post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, May 28
post.Content:
A quiet week this week, which is fine for me as I get over a lingering flu. Enjoy! :-)

  • Abhinay Argarwal has written about how to create FXML-friendly JavaFX UI controls.
  • Pedro Duque Vieira has blogged about his Parallax Pane control.
  • CustomStage v1.3.1 is out and has additional features for JavaFX application development, including FileLoader and SceneManager.
